flawed_nl_solution:
Josh gave a total of 3 x 10 = <<3*10=30>>30 candies to his siblings.
He was then left with 100 - 30 = <<100-30=70>>70 candies.
He gave 70/2 = <<70/2=53>>53 candies to his best friend.
So he had 70 - 53 = <<70-53=17>>17 candies left.
Since he only wants to eat 16 candies, there are still 17 - 16 = <<17-16=1>>1 candies left to be shared with others.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 35.0, not 53.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
